comment.author: 7806261@N06
comment._content: Sailing canoe race? These canoes where the first recorded planning sailboats.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/miniop] Well spotted, aren't they wonderful looking little craft? Our vessels curator agrees with you, in fact in the Evening News Article, 16 December 1895, the results of a canoe race is mentioned.
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment.author: 7806261@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] The same source gives the prizes for all the races on the day. No wonder the skipper is smiling, he might have won £3 or around $500 today
